text:
My friend, #ScottDenney, is a #mystery #writer. He wrote this post & I responded. Read in the screenshots.  Facebook wouldn't let me type it all. :/  Great to add a bit of #humor #levity to this #COVID19 #CoronaVirus #pandemic #vaccine situation. :)
